name: Photoshop AME Preset File
summary: Learn about .EPR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The Photoshop AME exporter can be used for outputting video in .DPX, .MP4 (H.264), and .MOV formats.

description: Settings file created by Photoshop, a professional graphics editing application; saves Adobe Media Encoder (AME) settings for encoding and exporting video from Photoshop; can be reused to export video with consistent settings.
